name: deimosrising
text: It is platonic spooning in fairness to them

name: cailetshadow
text: I don't care what you say, there is no such thing as platonic spooning from a man wearing a thong.

name: jhunt
text: Roast Beef and I feel the same way about camping.

name: zem
text: this was one of the set of strips my brother showed me to get me into achewood. it was a good choice.

name: riazm
text: This is one of the strips I show my brother to get myself out of camping.

name: riazm
text:
Ok, 6 months later I find this comment and it freaks me out.

Because I have no brother, I never have. What the fuck.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Hahaha you're a weirdo.

(Chubby.)

name: canusdivinus
text: Glitch in the Matrix?

name: jttuba
text: You funny riazm! You a real super-size homo jackass!

name: girlandagun
text: Special. Chubby.

name: jonmw
text: Shadow People got him?

name: zapatos
text: Hey man, you wanna go camping?

name: epicurus
text: This is the razor edge I mentally walk every time I think about going camping.

name: deancain29
text: I have the same feelings as Beef on camping

name: slanger
text: The way Beef talks in panel 4 is classic- starts out with an idea and just goes into more (funnier) detail.  Whenever I try this technique in real life I sound like a dork :(

name: jesler729
text: You can talk Roast Beef is talking from experiance.

name: jesler729
text:
Ugh.

experience.

name: twohundredninety
text:
I love how you have no chubbies for the observation but someone gave you one for correcting your spelling.

(Well, okay, I just went back and gave you one for the first comment, but it wasn't like that when I found it.)

name: jesler729
text: I really, really wish we could edit comments. There was a night when I got high and went on just this posting rampage, and almost every single one had some glaring typo. I feel like... I feel like I'm going to get a reputation, you know?

name: farqussus
text: i know you! You're that jesler who sucks at spelling.

name: jesler729
text: nooooo

name: zapatos
text: tell?

name: tttt
text: never tell the truth whilst camping

name: nicolae
text: Man how can you not dig on camping it's the ultimate expression of habitation

name: godfatherofsouls
text: All laughin' and tellin' lies!

name: jonnay
text: Man, ain't nothin' better than laughin' and tellin' lies!

name: tekende
text:
Just look at all those apostrophes

Just look at them

It is so nice

name: godfatherofsouls
text: it's the crux of the biscuit, you see

name: minortough
text: I feel like Roast Beef's image of their camping is much more accurate than that of Ray's.

name: molesticide
text:
nobody meets ladies when you go camping

you don't meet ladies when you go camping

there are no ladies camping

name: cpnglxynchos
text: the ladies are smarter and are just at their friend's house somewhere on the countryside. there they have heat and better food that will probably not get burnt by a fire that would take seven to fifty years to make because Ray and Beef forgot what rains does to wood.

name: killerlimpet
text:
Or because your dumbass friends (Boy Scouts, incidentally) thought that you could start a fire by wrapping toilet paper around logs.

Fuckers.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: hah, or that.

name: girlandagun
text:
Actually, my ex started dating a girl he met while hiking. She does not shave anywhere at all and is not big on washing her hair, except sometimes with Dr. Bronner's.

Lesson: You can totally meet ladies while camping. But you will not meet the kind of ladies who have proper hygiene and smell acceptable.

name: slalvation
text:
I feel the same way as Beef about camping, except I mark those things as positives (aside from the tarantulas).

Sometimes your food always being cooked right gets boring.

name: selbencoirlo
text: I get enough failure in my day-to-day life that I rarely feel the need to travel for to experience new varieties of the same.

name: echidnaboy
text: This strip is the perfect expression of Ray and Beef's optimist/pessimist dynamic.

name: salo
text:
I'm pretty new to achewood, so I haven't really thought about that before. I tried switching up the pros/cons just to see how it worked out

I apologize up front for not getting the exact fonts, sometimes I've less patience with fonts than perhaps I should.

name: echidnaboy
text: Excellent! Beef's dejected expression in panel 3 works so well. That boy could see a rainbow turning out badly.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: Roast Beef and I should open a home for people scared of spiders.

name: thesyndicate88
text: Let me get in on the ground floor.

name: wallabeechamp
text: I also want to move into this house! I can bring nachos! And a couch!

name: zapatos
text: I would totally sabotage that place.  Always leaving a window open, maybe just catching spiders all day and throwin' them in there.  Oh ho ho, I would laugh.

name: history
text: My dad thought camping was a vacation.  I thought it was a nightmare.  This conversation speaks to me on a father-son level I cannot even put into words.  Made me call home after I read it.  However, there was no spooning.

name: charchar
text: I went camping once.  It was in tents. (say aloud.  please. for me?)

name: justa
text: I cannot speak for anyone else, sir or madame, but I loled.

name: tekende
text: Oh, terrible!

name: aparrish
text:
Guy goes to the doctor and says, "I don't know what's happening to me! Sometimes I think I'm a wigwam, and sometimes I think I'm a teepee! You gotta help out me, Doc."

Doctor gets a thoughtful expression on his face. "I know what your problem is," he says. "You're two tents."

name: wurlitzergirl
text: It's worth a 5 for panel 6 alone.

name: paco
text: camping is what you make it, and who you're with. It can be as Ray describes, or as Beef tells it/

name: mangecoeur
text: This one made me lough out loud like I was drunk again

name: mikeronomicon
text: I could totally see Ray drunk passed out and spooning anyone that happened to be near by.
